abstract: Unilever, the consumer goods giant, on Friday agreed to pay 1.275 billion euros ($1.8 billion) for the personal care business of Sara Lee, bringing it brands such as Sanex and Radox.
snippet: Unilever, the consumer goods giant, on Friday agreed to pay 1.275 billion euros ($1.8 billion) for the personal care business of Sara Lee, bringing it brands such as Sanex and Radox.
lead_paragraph: Unilever, the consumer goods giant, on Friday agreed to pay 1.275 billion euros ($1.8 billion) for the personal care business of Sara Lee , bringing it brands such as Sanex and Radox.

headline.main: Unilever Pays $1.8 Billion for Sara Lee Unit
